track: Track your workout plans and nutrition here.
cardio-description: For improving cardio vascular health through regular and consistent aerobic activities.
running-description: Running is one of the most effective forms of aerobic exercise.
jump-rope-description: Jumping rope benefits several muscles at the same time.
weight-lifting-description: To build muscle and strength through regular and focused strength training exercises.
strength-training-description: Do strength training exercises for all major muscle groups at least two times a week.
beginner-guide-description: Use our beginner strength training guide to begin losing weight and building muscle.
